content.en: Neuroimaging advancements: Scientists are using algorithms to design intelligent tools that can navigate and analyze brain image data, address computational challenges in neuroimaging, and develop frameworks and infrastructure for neuroscientific investigations. Algorithms are also being used to create shared repositories of brain image data for schizophrenia research, manage and analyze large biomedical data, and integrate multi-modal data within a unified framework. Additionally, algorithms are being utilized to develop comprehensive data atlases, open-source software platforms, and platforms for reproducible neuroimaging analytics, as well as to explore and analyze Big Data in neuroscience and neurology.
content.da: Fremskridt inden for neuroimaging: Forskere bruger algoritmer til at designe intelligente værktøjer, der kan navigere og analysere hjernedatabilleder, tackle beregningsmæssige udfordringer i neuroimaging og udvikle rammer og infrastruktur for neurovidenskabelige undersøgelser. Algoritmer bruges også til at skabe fælles databaser med hjernedatabilleder til forskning i skizofreni, administrere og analysere store biomedicinske data samt integrere multimodale data inden for en samlet ramme. Derudover anvendes algoritmer til at udvikle omfattende dataatlasser, open source-softwareplatforme og platforme til reproducerbar neuroimaging-analyse samt til at udforske og analysere Big Data inden for neurovidenskab og neurologi.
